text: 'My mom always said life was like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get.'
author: Forrest Gump

text: 'We buy things we don't need, to impress people we don't like.'
author: Fight Club

text: 'Maybe we have to break ourselves to make something better out of ourselves'
author: Fight Club

text: 'You need to take your enemy's side if you're going to see things the way they do.'
author: The game of thrones

text: 'Never trust doctors.'
author: Doctor House

text: 'The Force will be with you. Always.'
author: Star Wars

text: 'Keep your friends close, but your enemies closer.'
author: The Godfather

text: 'I'm going to make him an offer he can't refuse.'
author: The Godfather

text: 'Houston, we have a problem.'
author: Apollo 13

text: 'There's no place like home.'
author: The Sage of Oz

text: 'After all, tomorrow is another day!'
author: Gone with the wind

text: 'If nobody hates you, you’re doing something wrong.'
author: Doctor House

text: 'The first rule of Fight Club is: You do not talk about Fight Club.'
author: Fight Club

text: 'Get busy livin’, or get busy dyin’.'
author: The Shawshank Redemption

text: 'Every man dies, but not every man really lives.'
author: Braveheart

text: 'Do, or do not. There is no “try”'
author: Star Wars

text: 'But they don’t know that we know they know we know!'
author: Friends

text: 'You know what’s worse than useless? Useless and oblivious.'
author: Doctor House

text: 'You want to make things right? Too bad. Nothing’s ever right.'
author: Doctor House

text: 'If you talk to God you’re religious. If God talks to you, you’re psychotic.'
author: Doctor House

text: Stupid is as stupid does.
author: Forrest Gump

text: Gonna eat till I’m tired and then sleep till I’m hungry.
author: Deadpool

text: Never underestimate the stupidity of idiots.
author: Deadpool

text: There is only one thing we say to death: Not today.
author: The game of thrones

text: That’s what I do: I drink and I know things.
author: The game of thrones

text: Frankly, my dear, I don’t give a damn.
author: Gone with the wind

text: How fickle is woman.
author: Gone with the wind

text: Chaos isn’t a pit. Chaos is a ladder.
author: The game of thrones

text: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given to us.
author: Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

text: It is not our abilities that show what we truly are. It is our choices.
author: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
